ModMetaData.name: Simple Fishnets
ModMetaData.author: Pasmeia
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod which adds 6 fishnets for all vanilla bodytypes (adult only).
[list] [*]Craftable (included support for large tailoring station from VFE Production) [*]Using material color (it doesn't really make sence for all of them to be black) [*]Can be worn by nudists without mood penalty [*]Recipes require complex clothing to be researched [*]Textures are 512*512, dds included [/list]
Non-steam download: [url=github.com/Pasmeia/rimworld-simple-fishnets] GitHub [/url].
As this is my first mod i may have failed miserably somewhere, though nothing game-breaking happened while testing.
Credits: Catbot1310 for [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3220409926] Fishnets for Nal's Realistic Body [/url] (which served as an inspiration). peresabcod for [url=www.deviantart.com/peresabcod/art/Seamless-Fishnet-Lingerie-Texture-Pack-2-810850293] Seamless Fishnet - Lingerie Texture Pack 2 [/url] (i have failed at making my own). Neronix17 for [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2275310562] Vanilla Pawns Retextured [/url] (which body textures i used as a base).
